Beschreibung
ApplicationConfig
 
ApplicationKonsolOutput
The ApplicationKonsolOutput class is used to print out important information about the application after initialization.
AuthenticationController
The AuthenticationController class is a Spring REST controller for handling authentication requests such as registering and authenticating users.
AuthenticationResponse
The AuthenticationResponse class is used to encapsulate the authentication token returned by the authentication service.
AuthenticationService
The AuthenticationService class is a service that handles user registration and authentication.
BaseDto
The BaseEntity class is an abstract class for the ID of all DTO object, It contains the ID field, which can be null
BaseEntity
The BaseEntity class is an abstract class that serves as a base for all entities in the project.
Card
The class representing a database entity of a card
Card2BrainApplication

CardAlreadyExistsException
 
CardDto
CardDto is a Data Transfer Object class representing a Card.
CardMapper
CardMapper class is responsible for mapping between Card and CardDto objects.
CardNotFoundException
 
CardNotValidException
 
CardRepository
This interface extends JpaRepository and provides methods for finding and retrieving Card objects from the database.
CardRestController
 
CardService
CardService is an interface that defines the methods to perform CRUD operations on Card objects.
CardServiceImpl
This class provides the implementation for the CardService interface.
Category
The class representing a database entity of a category
CategoryAlreadyExistsException
 
CategoryDto
CategoryDto is a Data Transfer Object class representing a Category.
CategoryMapper
This class is responsible for mapping between Category and CategoryDto objects.
CategoryNotFoundException
 
CategoryNotValidException
 
CategoryRepository
Interface for CategoryRepository which extends JpaRepository and provides additional methods for retrieving Category objects
CategoryRestController
The CategoryRestController class is responsible for handling HTTP requests for categories.
CategoryService
Interface for the CategoryService class, providing methods for handling and manipulating categories.
CategoryServiceImpl
This class provides the implementation for the CategoryService interface.
EmailHasToBeUniqueException
Exception to indicate that email already exists and must be unique.
EmptyDb
Abstract class EmptyDb provides methods to delete data from the database.
ExceptionHandlerAdvice
The ExceptionHandlerAdvice class provides a centralized exception handling mechanism for the application.
GenerateTestuserWithToken
GenerateTestuserWithToken is an abstract class that extends the EmptyDb class.
HasLogger
This interface provides a default method for obtaining a logger instance.
HealthCheck
HealthCheck controller is a controller which shows that the application is running succsesfull This class provides a method to check by returning a html response containing the version, build time, and the server port.
InfoDto
InfoDto is a Data Transfer Object class.
InfoService
 
InfoServiceImpl
InfoServiceImpl is a class that implements the InfoService interface and provides methods for getting information about cards and categories for a given user.
JwtAuthenticationFilter
JwtAuthenticationFilter is responsible for checking the validity of the JWT token present in the Authorization header of the incoming request.
JwtService
JWT service to handle the generation, validation and extraction of claims from JWT tokens.
Learn
 
LearnDto
LearnDto is a Data Transfer Object class.
LearnMapper
LearnMapper is a component class that maps a LearnDto to a Learn object and retrieves a Category object by its id.
LearnRestController
RestController class for handling when the user is in the learning mode.
LearnService
LearnService interface provides methods to manage and retrieve information related to learning.
LearnServiceImpl
This class is the implementation of the LearnService interface.
LoginDto
LoginDto is a Data Transfer Object class.
LoginMapper
The LoginMapper class provides methods for converting between User and LoginDto objects and for retrieving a User .

PasswordNotValidException
 
PrepareDbForOnlineTests
Class to prepare the database for online tests.
RepetitionService
RepetitionService interface provides a method to calculate the next repetition date based on the number of correct answers in a row.
RepetitionServiceImpl
RepetitionServiceImpl is a service class that implements the RepetitionService interface.

SecurityConfiguration
Security Configuration class This class is used to configure the security for the application.

Class to compare different data objects.
TestDataGenerator
The TestDataGenerator class is responsible for generating test data for unit tests.
User
The User class represents an user in the Card2Brain application.

UserDto is a Data Transfer Object class representing a user.
UserMapper
The UserMapper class provides methods for converting between User and UserDto objects and for retrieving a User.

UserNotValidException
 
UserRepository
Interface for UserRepository which extends JpaRepository and provides additional methods for retrieving User objects
UserRestController
RestController class for User entity.
UserService
Interface for UserService, providing methods for managing and manipulating User objects.
UserServiceImpl
The UserServiceImpl class is an implementation of the UserService interface that provides a set of methods for managing user data in the application, such as adding, updating, and deleting users.
